shri lankika shramikayan wenuwen palamu warata pawathwana jathyanthara samuluwa jordanaye amman nuwara di aarambha weyi.widesha rakiya sandaha merata shramikayan laba ganna ratawala shri lanka thanapathiwaru, kamkaru lekamwaru, ha suba sadhana niladharinge sahabhagithwayen pawathwena me samuluwa amman nuwara “la meridiyan” hotalaye di eeye (13) aarambha kerunu athara eya heta (15) nimawata pathweyi.me athara ema samuluwa sandaha jathyanthara sanwidhana niyojanaya karamin jathyanthara kamkaru sanwidhanaya, jathyanthara sankramanikayange sanwidhanaye niyojithayan da sahabhagi wana bawa shri lanka widesha sewa niyukthi karyanshaya pawasayi.shramikayanta balapana jathyanthara nithi ha pragnyapthi, wideshayanhi sewaya karana shri lanka shramikayanta balapana wruththimaya gatalu, rakiya sthana pilibanda gatalu, watup sambandha gatalu ha aarakshanaya, suba sadhanaya, widesha rakiyawe di gatha yuthu kriyamarga aadiya pilibandawa mehi di wishesha awadhanaya yomu karana bawa penwa dena ema karyanshaya ema gatalu handuna ganimin eewata paladayi wisandum nirdesha kirima da mehi aramuna bawa kiya siti.lokaye ratawal 20 ka thanapathiwarun me awasthawata sahabhagi wana athara widesha rakiya prawardhana ha suba sadhana amathi dilan perera mahatha pradhana aaradhithaya washayen sahabhagi weyi.eeta amatharawa widesha katayuthu amathyanshaye lekam karunathilaka amunugama, widesha rakiya prawardhana ha suba sadhana amathyanshaye lekam nishshanka en.
